inputs.text:
Statsig | The #1 Feature Management and Experimentation Platform











































        Platform
      

        Developers
      

        Resources
      

        Pricing
      



        Sign In
      

        Sign Up
      

        Book a Live Demo
      








 Platform


 Developers


 Resources













OVERVIEW




          Statsig Blog 


          Peak Velocity is our blog where we cover the latest in 
          experimentation and more
        


See All Features 




KEY FEATURES






Feature Management

              Ship faster and more confidently
            







Experimentation

              Run 100s of randomized, multivariate experiments
            







Data Warehouse

              Run experiments natively, in your warehouse
            







Analytics

              Actionable intelligence at your fingertips
            









          ROLES
        



Engineering


Dev Ops


Data Science


Product Management






          VERTICALS
        



Artificial Intelligence


Gaming


B2B Saas


E-Commerce










            Build fast with Be Significant
            Our exclusive startup program
          








GETTING STARTED






Documentation

                Documentation to get you started with implementation
              







Walkthrough Guides

                Guides to get you started with Statsig in no time
              







SDKs and APIs

                Explore REST API and SDKs in more than 20 frameworks
              







Integrations

                Learn more about connecting Statsig to your existing tools
              







A/B Testing Calculator

                Looking for a place to start your A/B Test?  Try out our calculator
              







How Statsig Works

                Get under the hood and check out how Statsig scales with you
              






MORE LINKS



Open Source Code

            All our SDKs and supporting libraries are Ope

run_info.output: Statsig is a feature management and experimentation platform that offers feature management, experimentation, data warehouse, and analytics capabilities. The platform caters to various roles such as engineering, DevOps, data science, and product management across different verticals such as artificial intelligence, gaming, B2B SaaS, and e-commerce. Statsig also offers documentation, walkthrough guides, SDKs and APIs, integrations, and an A/B testing calculator to help users get started with the platform. Additionally, the platform has an exclusive startup program called "Be Significant."
